thread.title: Scotland and Wales lead mortgage boom as London housing market cools
thread.title_full: Scotland and Wales lead mortgage boom as London housing market cools

author: Tim Wallace
title: Scotland and Wales lead mortgage boom as London housing market cools
text: Scotland and Wales lead mortgage boom as London housing market cools Lending in London is falling, but the wider UK is witnessing a surge in house buying Scotland, not London, is now at the leading edge of Britain's house-buying boom Photo: Anthony Brown
